response:
Urgent neuroimaging is required to confirm the location of lesions and differentiate between inflammation (demyelination) and neoplasm. CSF analysis and specific serology are essential to distinguish between MS, NMO, and MOGAD, as treatments differ.

investigations = ["MRI Brain and Whole Spine with Gadolinium contrast", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "C-reactive protein", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Serum Aquaporin-4 antibodies", "Serum MOG antibodies", "Autoimmune screen (ANA, ANCA, ENA)", "Serum Vitamin B12 and Folate", "HIV serology", "Syphilis serology", "Lumbar Puncture (CSF opening pressure, cell count, protein, glucose, oligoclonal bands, culture, viral PCR)"]
